accueil.title: Agile Grenoble

description.paragraphe1: Do you like stories ? So if we were telling the origin of agility, would you be interested ?
description.paragraphe2: This year we will make you discover or rediscover that agility is primarily technical and that it’s not so easy to frequently deliver a good quality product without having good practices. We’ll also talk about people, and the difficulty of making them work together and techniques that facilitate the build of a successful team. We will remind you that it’s for bringing value to users that we do all this. And finally, we will not forget to tell you that this requires a change of mindset, some letting go and benevolence.

accueil.date: Come to Agile Grenoble to hear the stories of those who live or attempt Agility, during one or more days, november 16-19th 2016.

apropos.title: About
apropos.description: The conference Agile Grenoble exists since 2008 and the 2016 edition will be the 9th conference in a row. The event is wholly organized by the volunteers of the Club Agile Rhône-Alpes Grenoble, with of course the support of our sponsors and partners.

cara.title: Club Agile Rhône Alpes (CARA)
cara.description: The CARA is a non-profit association, striving to promote and disseminate agile methods in the Rhône-Alpes area to a large public, with various means: conference, seminars, meetings and partnerships.
